content: the lj ear warmer by cary bach donahou skill level advanced beginner/intermediate size stitch counts for each size in pattern will appear in this manner - pre-teen teen/adult xl 1 materials worsted weight yarn - i used i love this yarn from hobby lobby i hook 5 25mm/5 5mm or whatever size needed to obtain gauge scissors yarn needle gauge 12 row 16 half_double_crochet in each row = 5in x 5in square abbreviations half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fphdc front post half_double_crochet bphdc back post half_double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet fhdc foundation half_double_crochet sl slip_stitch chain chain st s stitch s special stitch & tutorial links half_double_crochet in third loop of the previous row of half_double_crochet sometimes called a camel stitch this creates the raised ridge photo tutorial at end of pattern page 5 tutorial for fphdc/bphdc https //www youtube com/watch v=ebq41jrdabw tutorial for fpdc/bpdc https //www youtube com/watch v=s42_486hreu tutorial for fhdc https //www youtube com/watch v=i9og5cd2l0o 2 lj ear warmer *each round begins in the same stitch as joining slip_stitch beginning chain s does not count as stitch* round 1 leaving a long tail fhdc 60 64 68 join with sl to beginning fhdc do not turn 60 64 68 round 2 chain 1 in third loop half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 3 chain 2 *fpdc in next st bpdc in next st* around sl to join 60 64 68 round 4 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 5 chain 1 in third loop half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 6 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 7 chain 1 in third loop half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 9 - 10 chain 1 *fphdc in next st bphdc in next* around sl to join 60 64 68 fasten_off turn work so that your beginning fhdc is at the top with the long tail from round 1 close the gap and fasten_off then re-attach your yarn in the same st you just used to close the gap proceed to round 11 3 round 11 attach yarn in the first st on the fhdc chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 12 chain 1 in third loop half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 13 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st around sl to join 60 64 68 round 14 - 15 chain 1 *fphdc in next st bphdc in next* around sl to join 60 64 68 fasten_off weave in all ends enjoy *check out the other patterns in the lj collection the lj beanie 3-in-1 slouchy beanie messy bun and they lj cowl so far 4 third loop photo tutorial *the red line is
